weekly_top_story.headline: House Passes Hospital at Home Extension, Give Kids a Chance Legislation
weekly_top_story.summary: The U.S. House passed legislation extending the Medicare Acute Hospital Care at Home waiver for five years beyond its January 30, 2025 expiration, enabling continued expansion of home-based acute care and potentially transforming healthcare delivery models for Medicare beneficiaries.

stories.headline: US Reps Berate FDA Head, Demand Data For Proposed Vaccine Regulation Changes, Purported Link To Child Deaths
stories.summary: U.S. congressional representatives sent a scathing letter to FDA Commissioner Martin Makary condemning an agency email with alleged inaccuracies and unsupported claims linking COVID-19 vaccines to pediatric deaths, highlighting ongoing tensions in vaccine oversight and public trust.

stories.headline: South Carolina Measles Outbreak Grows; New Case Identified In Colorado
stories.summary: South Carolina reported eight new measles cases and exposures at four schools while a new case emerged in Colorado, underscoring rising vaccination gaps and public health risks amid declining immunization rates.
